text: Vel muhsanatu minen nisai illa ma meleket eymanukum, kitabellahi aleykum, ve uhille lekum ma verae zalikum en tebtegu bi emvalikum muhsinine gayre musafihin(musafihine), fe mestemtaâ€™tum bihi minhunne fe atuhunne ucurehunne feridah(feridaten) ve la cunaha aleykum fima teradaytum bihi min baâ€™dil feridah(feridati) innallahe kane alimen hakima(hakimen)
